attributes.action: tax the trucks off the road
attributes.additional_details: Economy back on track - and maybe the climate camp demands could be more tolerant of rambling transient people? Again border-leaks for subsidy, say tax policy to engineer economic models for sustainable unified markets highlights private highwayman taxes on the web of trade given any interference to awareness by such 'other people'. Pass it down and scrap the environment and built environment from conflicts beyond any benefit of competition.
